org.locationtech.geowave.format.sentinel2

Class Sentinel2ImageryProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.format.sentinel2.Sentinel2ImageryProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmazonImageryProvider, TheiaImageryProvider

    public abstract class Sentinel2ImageryProvider
extends Object
    Defines a provider of Sentinel2 imagery.
